review:
If you don't apply logic, this movie is fun to watch. Not a great plot though. But yes entertainment provided in a nutshell. This is a one time recommended watch.You can watch it with your family.
Watch it for Akshay and his perfect comic timing. He is outstanding and brings down the house with his antics.
Watch it for the great performance of Junior (Dog).
Watch it for some good humor, cinematography, songs and great supporting casts.
And last but not on the least, watch it for very sexy Tamman ...MORE

If you don't apply logic, this movie is fun to watch. Not a great plot though. But yes entertainment provided in a nutshell. This is a one time recommended watch.You can watch it with your family.
Watch it for Akshay and his perfect comic timing. He is outstanding and brings down the house with his antics.
Watch it for the great performance of Junior (Dog).
Watch it for some good humor, cinematography, songs and great supporting casts.
And last but not on the least, watch it for very sexy Tammanah, who lights up the screen even when she is out of it.

Beautiful movie depicting a love for a pet the climax is really touching.... The movie is overall an OK direction suggesting and surrounding about pets.... The acting is definitely superb but the plot could have been strengthened... At the middle of the movie it grew to be boring but the finishing was great.... As it says all's well that ends well... So it is a must watch film that gives u a good impact... I give it a 3.5/5
Very,very beautiful! Entertainment,songs are very good! Emotional and fantastic movie! And the story is the best!I love dogs ,cats and all animals so this is my favourite movie!
Kind of comic but good entertainer. Don't be too logical, just enjoy this fun movie with couple of really emotional scenes. Special for me because this is one of the last movie watched with my ex!!
